The results of the nine months of 2014 show that this year will remain a successful year in history.
Recent reforms and initiatives have ensured dynamic development of our country.
Gross domestic product increased by 2.5 percent in the nine months and non-oil sector by 6 percent.
Inflation was 1.5 percent, and the monetary income of the population increased by 5.4 percent.
From the beginning of the year, $ 19 billion has been invested in the economy of Azerbaijan.
Our main goal is to maximize our dependence on oil factor and at the expense of the non-oil sector (cont) http://t.co/nsFluFZPNO
Since the beginning of the year our financial resources have grown by $ 3 billion 600 million and exceeded $ 53 billion.
We keep transparent oil revenues and contribute to our country's development, including social projects (cont) http://t.co/IHgkzuG8V4
Social programs are being implemented; salaries, pensions, and average wages have increased in nine months.
Every year, at least 20,000 IDPs are moved to new homes.
Additional steps will be taken to help unemployment and we should try to avoid unemployment in Azerbaijan.
Modern processing facilities are being established in Azerbaijan. At present there are many excellent opportunities to increase our export potential.
The development of tourism is rapidly developing. We have wonderful nature, any type of tourism available in Azerbaijan. There is also an infrastructure.
Five-star, four star, three-star fine hotels are created in airports, highways and all the regions.
The future development of Azerbaijan should be related to the development of the industry.
The creation of industrial clusters should continue in the future.
Azerbaijan's transit potential is strengthened. Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railway project is over.
New Baku International Sea Port is ready. The shipbuilding plant was commissioned in September last year.
The Caspian littoral states can also use our opportunities.
We need to build a co-ordination between the Caspian littoral states at a higher level.
20 years ago, on September 20, the "Contract of the Century" was signed and it determined the development of Azerbaijan.
The project of the XXI century is also the Southern Gas Corridor.
The Southern Gas Corridor will allow us to maximize our resources to world markets and our coverage will also increase.
The implementation of this project should be based on high environmental standards.
The preparations for the European Games are on schedule. We will hold the first European Games at the Summer Olympics.
